YANG BSKUL, BRAG YAB SPRUL SKU CHUNG BA PHYAG MDZOD DANG BCAS
PAS JA KHAG DRUG MA BRGYAD CU DANG BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR,
SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG MANG THOS 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES,
RDZOGS PA'I

SANGS RGYAS ZIL GNON ME RTA'I LO LA BLTAMS PA NAS LO NYIS STONG
DRUG BRGYA DANG SUM CU SO BZHI DANG, SANGS RGYAS NAS LO NYIS
STONG LNGA BRGYA DANG GO DGU DANG, DUS 'KHOR RTZA RGYUD GSUNGS
NAS LO NYIS STONG LNGA

BRGYA GO BRGYAD DANG, ZHI BAR GSHEGS NAS NYIS STONG LNGA BRGYA
DANG LNGA BCU NGA BZHI DANG, GRAGS PAS BSDUS RGYUD MDZAD NAS LO
NYIS STONG DANG NYAG MA GNYIS DANG, KLA KLO ZHUGS NAS STONG DANG
GO

@416B DRUG DANG, RGYAL DKA'I BYED RTZIS BRTZAMS NAS DGU BRGYA
DANG NYAG MA BCU GSUM SONG BA DANG, RAB BYUNG SOGS KYI 'DAS LO
DRUG BRGYA DANG GO GNYIS SONG BA, BSTAN PA LNGA BRGYA PA PHRAG
BCU'I TSUL KHRIMS

LE'U'I STENG NAS NGA BZHI 'DAS PA, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA BI LAM
BA BHA ZHES PA RNAM 'PHYANG GI LO, RGYA RTZIS KYI LBU ZUL ZHES
PA DBANG THANG GI SA KHYI'I LO, SANGS RGYAS KYIS MU STEGS KYI
TSOGS CHO 'PHRUL GYIS

TSAR BCAD PA'I CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS RDZOGS PA GSUM
PA'I RGYU SKAR DRANG SRONG RNGA BONG GIS BSGRIGS PA'I MCHU, GZA'
PHUR BU, DUS 'KHOR GYI DBYANGS AA, GSAL BYED DA, KHAMS SA, YON

TAN DRI, NA TSOD SMIN PA DANG, DBYANGS 'CHAR GYI DBYANGS AO,
GSAL BYED HA, 'BYUNG BA NAM MKHA', YON TAN SGRA DANG, RGYA RTZIS
KYI 'BRUG GI NYI MA LA, RGYAL BAS LUNG BSTAN PA'I

GNAS DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB DAR RGYAS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR
BA'I YI GE PA NI, GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BSAM BLO SGOM
PAS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG, KUN MKHYEN RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA SPYI
DANG,
